tool_description: Language Detection is a web based Deep Neural Network (DNN) language identification model, utilizing Python and TensorFlow. It uses character n-grams to classify text input languages efficiently. Insights into the network's language differentiation process are provided through t-SNE and PCA visualizations.
name: Language Detection API
title: Language Detection API

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://language-detection-api1.p.rapidapi.com/ich-bin-du-bist-wie"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "language-detection-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
